h4.p: [22] etthantare ya.m carita.m, sabba.m ta.m bodhipaacana.m..
[22] imamhi kappe carita.m, pavakkhissa.m su.nohi me..
[22] ajjhogaahetvaa {ajjhogahetvaa (sii0 syaa0)} viharaami, akitti naama taapaso..
[21] ``na tassa daana.m dadamaano, yasa.m laabha~nca patthayi.m.
[22] tattha biija.m na ropeti, na so dha~n~nena atthiko..
[22] yadi tattha kaara.m na karomi, naaha.m pu~n~nena atthiko..
[22] na deti tesa.m dhanadha~n~na.m, muddito parihaayati..
[22] yadi tassa daana.m na dadaami, parihaayissaami pu~n~nato'..
[22] api ca daana.m paripuurento, eva.m tassa adaasaha''nti..
[22] maa me bhijji samaadaana.m, dassaami vipula.m gaja.m'..
[22] jala.m hatthe aakiritvaa, braahma.naana.m ada.m gaja.m..
[22] `ki.m nu tuyha.m vara.m naaga.m, yaacakaana.m padassasi..
[22] tasmi.m naage padinnamhi, ki.m te rajja.m karissati..
[22] sabba~n~nuta.m piya.m mayha.m, tasmaa naaga.m adaasaha'''nti..
[22] `ko ki.m icchati pattheti, kassa ki.m diiyatuu dhana.m..
[21] ```ko chaatako ko tasito, ko maala.m ko vilepana.m.
[22] iti ^a^T2.0555^ea^ saaya~nca paato ca, ghosaapemi tahi.m tahi.m..
[21] ``divaa vaa yadi vaa ratti.m, yadi eti vanibbako.
[22] napaaha.m dessa.m dhana.m dammi, napi natthi nicayo mayi..
[22] tena demi mahaadaana.m, akkhobbha.m {akkhobha.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} saagaruupama.m..
[21] ``na ^a^T2.0556^ea^ ^a^M2.0389^ea^ me dessa.m dhana.m dha~n~na.m, napi natthi nicayo mayi.
[22] sabba~n~nuta.m piya.m mayha.m, tasmaa demi vara.m dhana''nti..
[22] yattha laabho mahaa hoti, tattha ta.m {tattha na.m (sii0), tattha (ka0)} harati bha.n.daka.m..
[21] ```ya.m ki~nci maanusa.m daana.m, adinna.m me na vijjati.
[22] yopi yaaceyya ma.m cakkhu.m, dadeyya.m avikampito'..
[22] cintento vividha.m daana.m, adeyya.m so na passati..
[21] ```tatha.m ^a^V2.0377^ea^ nu vitatha.m neta.m, handa viima.msayaami ta.m.
[22] muhutta.m aagameyyaatha, yaava jaanaami ta.m mana.m'..
[22] eka.m me nayana.m dehi, tvampi ekena yaapaya'..
[21] ```ehi sivaka u.t.thehi, maa dandhayi maa pavedhayi.
[21] ``tato ^a^T2.0559^ea^ so codito mayha.m, sivako vacana.m karo.
[21] ``na me dessaa ubho cakkhuu, attaa na me na dessiyo.
[22] sabba~n~nuta.m piya.m mayha.m, tasmaa cakkhu.m adaasaha''nti..
[21] ``yaa ^a^V2.0378^ea^ me ahosi janikaa, phussatii {phusatii (sii0)} naama khattiyaa.
[22] saa atiitaasu jaatiisu, sakkassa mahesii piyaa..
[21] ``eva.m vuttaa ca saa devii, sakka.m punidamabravi.
[27] `ki.m nu me aparaadhatthi, ki.m nu dessaa aha.m tava.
[21] ``eva.m ^a^M2.0392^ea^ vutto ca so sakko, puna tassidamabravi.
[22] `na ceva te kata.m paapa.m, na ca me tva.msi appiyaa..
[22] pa.tigga.nha mayaa dinne, vare dasa varuttame'..
[22] mama.m abbhantara.m katvaa, phussatii dasa vare varii..
[22] mama tejena me maataa, sadaa daanarataa ahu..
[22] sama.ne braahma.ne khii.ne, deti daana.m aki~ncane..
[22] vessaana.m viithiyaa majjhe, janesi phussatii mama.m..
[22] tadaa nisajja paasaade, daana.m daatu.m vicintayi.m..
[22] dadeyya.m kaaya.m saavetvaa, yadi koci yaacaye mama.m'..
[21] ``dadaami na vikampaami, ya.m ma.m yaacanti braahma.naa.
[22] santa.m nappatiguuhaami {nappatiguyhaami (sii0 ka0)}, daane me ramate mano..
[22] `maa me bhijji samaadaana.m, dassaami vipula.m gaja.m'..
[22] jala.m hatthe aakiritvaa, braahma.naana.m ada.m gaja.m..
[21] ``hatthi.m ^a^T2.0562^ea^ asse rathe datvaa, daasi.m daasa.m gava.m dhana.m.
[21] ```tva.m maddi ka.nha.m ga.nhaahi, lahukaa esaa kani.t.thikaa.
[22] aha.m jaali.m gahessaami, garuko bhaatiko hi so'..
[22] visama.m sama.m akkamantaa, va"nka.m gacchaama pabbata.m..
[21] ``rodante daarake disvaa, ubbiddhaa {ubbiggaa (syaa0 ka.m0)} vipulaa dumaa.
[22] te tato nikkhamitvaana, va"nka.m agamu pabbata.m..
[22] caturo janaa maya.m tattha, vasaama pabbatantare..
[22] maddii phala.m aaharitvaa, poseti saa tayo jane..
[22] aayaaci puttake mayha.m, jaali.m ka.nhaajina.m cubho..
[22] ubho putte gahetvaana, adaasi.m braahma.ne tadaa..
[21] ``na me dessaa ubho puttaa, maddidevii na dessiyaa.
[22] sabba~n~nuta.m piya.m mayha.m, tasmaa piye adaasaha.m..
[21] ``makka.to ca si"ngaalo ca, suttapoto caha.m tadaa.
[22] vasaama ekasaamantaa, saaya.m paato ca dissare {saaya.m paato padissare (ka0)}..
[22] `yadiha.m labhe dakkhi.neyya.m, ki.m me daana.m bhavissati..
[21] ```na ^a^V2.0383^ea^ me atthi tilaa muggaa, maasaa vaa ta.n.dulaa ghata.m.
[22] aha.m ti.nena yaapemi, na sakkaa ti.na daatave..
[21] ```yadi ^a^M2.0397^ea^ koci eti dakkhi.neyyo, bhikkhaaya mama santike.
[22] dajjaaha.m sakamattaana.m, na so tuccho gamissati'..
[21] ``aggi.m tattha padiipesi, yathaa so khippa.m mahaa bhave.
[22] sameti darathapari.laaha.m, assaada.m deti piiti ca..
[22] sabba.m sameti daratha.m, yathaa siitodaka.m viya..
[21] nimi candakumaaro ca, sivi vessantaro saso.
[22] ahameva tadaa aasi.m, yo te daanavare adaa..
[22] jiivita.m yaacake datvaa, ima.m paarami puurayi.m..
[22] daanena me samo natthi, esaa me daanapaaramiiti..
[22] na tadaa atthi mahiyaa, gu.nena mama saadiso..
[22] saha gahite {sama.m gahite (sii0)} so.n.daaya, sayameva idhehi'ti..
[22] pa.tibalo bhave tesa.m, yaava rajjampi maanusa.m..
[22] na karomi citte a~n~nathatta.m, pakkhipanta.m mamaa.lake..
[21] ``yadi te ma.m tattha ko.t.teyyu.m, pharasuuhi tomarehi ca.
[22] yassa etena kara.niiya.m, dinna.myeva haraatu so..
[22] pe.laaya pakkhipitvaana, kii.leti ma.m tahi.m tahi.m..
[22] na karomi citte a~n~nathatta.m, pakkhipantampi pe.lake''ti..
[21] ``ya.m ^a^M2.0401^ea^ ya.m so va.n.na.m cintayi, niila.mva piitalohita.m.
[22] yadiha.m tassa pakuppeyya.m, kha.nena chaarika.m kare..
[22] neva siila.m pabhindeyya.m, vikirante bhusa.m viyaa''ti..
[22] upagamma mama.m pucchi, `tuyhesaa kaa kassa bhariyaa'..
[21] ``na mesaa braahma.nii dessaa, napi me bala.m na vijjati.
[22] hotettha .thaana.m mahi.msaana.m, koci koci tahi.m tahi.m..
[22] ta.m .thaana.m upagantvaana, ti.t.thaami ca sayaami ca..
[22] duuseti ma.m sabbakaala.m, tena homi upadduto..
[22] `naaseheta.m chava.m paapa.m, si"ngehi ca khurehi ca'..
[21] ``eva.m ^a^V2.0389^ea^ vutte tadaa yakkhe, aha.m ta.m idamabravi.m.
[22] `ki.m tva.m makkhesi ku.napena, paapena anariyena ma.m..
[22] siila~nca me pabhijjeyya, vi~n~nuu ca garaheyyu ma.m..
[22] teva tassa vadhissanti, saa me mutti bhavissati..
[22] eva.m labhati sappa~n~no, manasaa yathaa patthita''nti..
[22] puriso ga"ngaaya papati, `jiivaami vaa maraami vaa'..
[22] ravanto karu.na.m rava.m, majjhe ga"ngaaya gacchati..
[21] ``so me pu.t.tho ca byaakaasi, attano kara.na.m tadaa.
[22] `eka.m ta.m vara.m yaacaami, maa ma.m kassaci paavada'..
[27] raajaa sutvaana vacana.m, usu.m tassa pakappayi.
[22] siilavaa hi tadaa aasi.m, bodhiyaayeva kaara.naa''ti..
[22] aha.m vasaami upari, he.t.thaa vasati braahma.no..
[21] ``yadiha.m tassa pakuppeyya.m, yadi siila.m na gopaye.
[21] ``ya.m ^a^P0.0089^ea^ so tadaa ma.m abhisapi, kupito du.t.thamaanaso.
[22] tasseva matthake nipati, yogena ta.m pamocayi.m..
[22] siilavaa hi tadaa aasi.m, bodhiyaayeva kaara.naa''ti..
[22] dhure dhura.m gha.t.tayantaa, samimhaa pa.tipathe ubho..
[22] so me pitumaggahesi, `bhakkhosi mama maa cali'..
[22] braahma.nassa dhana.m datvaa, pitaa aamantayii mama.m..
[21] ```rajja.m putta pa.tipajja, maa pamajji pura.m ida.m.
[22] kata.m me porisaadena, mama aagamana.m puna'..
[22] tena bhijjissati siila.m, parittaasa.m {paritaasa.m (sii0)} kate mayi..
[22] yassa etena kara.niiya.m, dinna.myeva haraatu so..
[22] bhojaputte na kuppaami, esaa me siilapaaramii''ti..
[22] ruru maata"ngo dhammo ca, atrajo ca jayaddiso..
[22] yassa kassaci niyyatta.m, tasmaa saa siilapaaramiiti..
[21] ``maataapitaa na me dessaa, napi me dessa.m mahaayasa.m.
[22] sabba~n~nuta.m piya.m mayha.m, tasmaa rajja.m pariccaji''nti..
[22] ta.m nisedhetu.m gacchanto, anusaasi pitaa mama.m..
[22] `kacci te gahapati kusala.m, ki.m vaa te aahariiyatu'..
[22] `kacci te bhante khamaniiya.m, sammaano te pavattito'..
[22] tassa ta.m vacana.m sutvaa, aa.naapesi mahiipati..
[22] rathiyaa rathiya.m dassetha, saa gati ja.tilahii.litaa'..
[22] `ra~n~no dassetha ma.m khippa.m, raajakiriyaani atthi me'..
[21] ``na ^a^V2.0396^ea^ me dessa.m mahaarajja.m, kaamabhogo na dessiyo.
[22] sabba~n~nuta.m piya.m mayha.m, tasmaa rajja.m pariccaji''nti..
[22] ajjeva putta pa.tipajja, kevala.m vasudha.m ima.m..
[22] rajjesu yadi rajjaami {ra~njaami (sii0)}, paapaana.m uttamo siya.m..
[22] nibbuti.m pariyesissa.m, yattha ma.m maccu na maddiye'..
[22] naagova bandhana.m chetvaa, paavisi.m kaanana.m vana.m..
[21] ``maataapitaa ^a^T2.0583^ea^ ^a^V2.0397^ea^ na me dessaa, napi me dessa.m mahaayasa.m.
[22] sabba~n~nuta.m piya.m mayha.m, tasmaa rajja.m pariccaji''nti..
[22] bhaginii ca bhaataro satta, nibbattaa sotthiye kule..
[22] ta.m me ahosi ka.thina.m, tatta {santatta (ka0)} phaalasama.m viya..
[21] ``te ma.m tadaa ukkhipanta.m, pucchi.msu patthita.m mama.
[22] `ki.m tva.m patthayase samma, yadi kaame na bhu~njasi'..
[21] ``te mayha.m vacana.m sutvaa, pitumaatu ca saavayu.m.
[21] ``ubho ^a^T2.0584^ea^ maataapitaa mayha.m, bhaginii ca satta bhaataro.
[21] ``yo ^a^M2.0412^ea^ me kani.t.thako bhaataa, nando naamaasi pa.n.dito.
[21] ``aha.m so.no ca nando ca, ubho maataapitaa mama.
[22] setacchatta.m dhaarayitvaana, sayane poseti ma.m pitaa..
[22] addasa.m pa.n.dara.m chatta.m, yenaaha.m niraya.m gato..
[21] ``saha ^a^V2.0399^ea^ di.t.thassa me chatta.m, taaso uppajji bheravo.
[22] saa ma.m disvaana dukkhita.m, tiisu .thaanesu yojayi..
[22] sabbo ta.m jano ocinaayatu, eva.m tava attho bhavissati'..
[22] `karomi te ta.m vacana.m, ya.m tva.m bha.nasi devate.
[22] ete a"nge adhi.t.thaaya, vassaani so.lasa.m vasi.m..
[21] ``tato me hatthapaade ca, jivha.m sota~nca maddiya.
[22] yassatthaaya tapoci.n.no, so me attho samijjhatha..
[22] saarathii kha.natii kaasu.m, nikhaatu.m pathaviyaa mama.m..
[21] ``maataapitaa na me dessaa, attaa me na ca dessiyo.
[22] adhi.t.thaanena me samo natthi, esaa me adhi.t.thaanapaaramii''ti..
[21] ``na tassa alika.m bha.nita.m, yathaa vaaca.m akaasaha.m.
[22] saccena me samo natthi, esaa me saccapaaramii''ti..
[22] tassaa phassena jiivaami, natthi me kaayika.m bala.m..
[21] ``paade ^a^M2.0415^ea^ pakkhe pajahaami, natthi me kaayika.m bala.m.
[22] soha.m agatiko tattha, eva.m cintesaha.m tadaa..
[22] te ma.m ohaaya pakkantaa, katha.m me ajja kaatave..
[27] vajjesi so.lasakariisaani, udaka.m patvaa yathaa sikhii.
[22] saccena me samo natthi, esaa me saccapaaramii''ti..
[21] ``tato kaakaa ca gijjhaa ca, ka"nkaa {bakaa (sii0)} kulalasenakaa.
[22] kaaka.m sokaaya randhehi, macche sokaa pamocaya'..
[22] saccena me samo natthi, esaa me saccapaaramii''ti..
[22] aha~nhi kassaci naacikkhi.m, arati me carati maanase..
[22] tenaaha.m dukkhito aasi.m, mama vaahasi ta.m dukkha.m..
[22] pa.thama.m akaasi.m kiriya.m, agga.m sacca.m varuttama.m..
[22] athaapara.m ya.m carita.m mameda.m, vassaani pa~n~naasasamaadhikaani..
[21] ```akaamako vaahi aha.m caraami, etena saccena suvatthi hotu.
[22] saccena me samo natthi, esaa me saccapaaramii''ti..
[22] yathaamati te kaahaami, yadi me tva.m punehisi'..
[22] upagantvaa pura.m ramma.m, rajja.m niyyaadayi.m tadaa..
[21] ``natthi me sa.msayo tattha, ghaatayissati vaa na vaa.
[22] saccena me samo natthi, esaa me saccapaaramii''ti..
[21] ``na ma.m koci uttasati, napi bhaayaami kassaci.
[21] ``eva.m me appamattassa, idha loke parattha ca.
[22] sabba.m hatthagata.m katvaa, kaasuyaa nikha.nii mama.m..
[22] mettaaya me samo natthi, esaa me mettaapaaramii''ti..
[21] ``ye me dukkha.m upaharanti, ye ca denti sukha.m mama.
[22] sabbesa.m samako homi, dayaa kopo na vijjati..
[22] sabbattha samako homi, esaa me upekkhaapaaramii''ti..
[27] sutasomo puna aasi.m {aasi (syaa0)}, saamo ca ekaraajahu.
[22] upekkhaapaaramii aasi, iti vuttha.m {vutta.m (sabbattha) a.t.thakathaa oloketabbaa} mahesinaa..
[21] eva.m ^a^M2.0420^ea^ bahubbidha.m dukkha.m, sampattii ca bahubbidhaa {sampatti ca bahuvidhaa (sii0), sampatti.m ca bahuvidha.m (ka0)}.
[21] datvaa daatabbaka.m daana.m, siila.m puuretvaa asesato.
[03] ittha.m suda.m bhagavaa attano pubbacariya.m sambhaavayamaano buddhaapadaaniya.m naama dhammapariyaaya.m abhaasitthaati.
